title: Spanish holiday home tax fiasco: Britons finally receiving refunds
text: Spanish holiday home tax fiasco: Britons finally receiving refunds The Spanish government is refunding thousands of Britons after it charged "discriminatory" rates of inheritance tax Joan Ridsdale has just received a â‚¬16,000 refund for the Spanish IHT bill she was forced to pay. Photo: Mark Pinder
